name: Dog StorieZ
description:
There's a safe bunker on the other side of the forest, with a ton of Zombies in the way. The only things on your side are your lovable dog Teddy, and your guns. Use both to get past the zombies before Armageddon strikes everything down on New Year's Day.

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

LMB - Fire

RMP - Use Scope

R - Reload

E - Change Guns

Left Shift - Dodge Roll

Space - Order Teddy To Attack
